verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse 1:
We have seen and heard the wonders of Your hands
How You loved us first, carried us to the promised land

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Prechorus:
Who is like You God? None that we know

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
We are overwhelmed, We are overwhelmed by You
Lord You came to our rescue, Now we live to worship You (x2)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Verse 2:
You have seen and heard our desperate cry for mercy
You became a curse so we could live in vict'ry
